_field_char_enum.name: default outline color index#index into outline material's 4-color 'outline_color' parameter

_field_real_fraction.name: default outline intensity:(0,1] - 0 or less defaults to 0.025
default outline thickness:(0,1] - 0 or less defaults to 0.25

_field_real.name: outline fade duration:(0...) seconds - 0 or less defaults to 0.33
interaction target outline intensity scale:[1...) - less than 1 defaults to 2#overall intensity will be capped at 1
interaction target outline thickness scale:[1...) - less than 1 defaults to 2.5#overall thickness will be capped at 1

_field_block_64.name: Ping Globals

_field_real.name: ping display time:seconds#how long tracked objects are marked

_field_block_64._field_explanation: The following list defines the default ranges at which objects can be hit with a ping. The list contains one default, per priority. They are ordered by increasing priority, from low to critical, so for example, the range for highest priority trackables should be entered under "0. DefaultRangeBlock".

The following list defines the maximum number of objects to be tracked per priority. Limits are ordered by increasing priority, from low to critical, so for example, the limit for highest priority trackables should be entered under "0. DisplayMaximumsBlock".

_field_byte_integer.name: maximum number of tracked objects displayed

_field_explanation.name: The following fields only apply to active tracking.

_field_tag_reference_64.name: ping effect 0&team Chief active ping effect#this effect is used when the spartan uses their tracking device
ping effect 1{ping effect}&team Locke active ping effect#this effect is used when the spartan uses their tracking device
ping effect 2&team Chief (cracked visor) active ping effect#this effect is used when the spartan uses their tracking device

_field_real.name: ping recharge time&active ping recharge time:seconds#minimum time (in seconds) between successive pings
ping travel rate&active ping travel rate:world units per second#approximation of how fast the active ping effect travels so we can synchronize when things show up in the UI
